name: CityofSaintLouisChaperone
0:
”Alexa, ask Saint Louis Chaperone to tell me some facts about Saint Louis”
”Alexa, ask Saint Louis Chaperone to tell me a good attraction”
”Alexa, ask Saint Louis Chaperone to tell me the local news”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saint louis chaperone
des: This skill is a guide to the city of Saint Louis, Missouri. You can ask for local news, attractions, and the top five things to do in Saint Louis. This skill will help chaperone a visitor to the city, or someone who wants to find new things to do.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
